contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox given name | name = Eliza | image= | imagesize= | caption= | pronunciation= | gender = Female | meaning = My God is an oath, joyful | region = | origin = | related names = Elise, Elisa, Elle, Liza, Elizabeth, Aliza | footnotes = }} '''Eliza''' is a female name in English, a shortened form of [[Elizabeth (given name)|Elizabeth]].<ref>{{cite web|title=Eliza|url=http://www.behindthename.com/name/eliza|publisher=Behind the Name|accessdate=12 January 2012}}</ref> It may also be used as or a variant of the Hebrew name Aliza, עַלִיזָה meaning "joyful". <ref>{{cite web|title=Aliza|url=http://www.behindthename.com/name/aliza|publisher=Behind the Name|accessdate=12 January 2012}}</ref> <ref>{{cite web|title=Aliza|url=http://www.thinkbabynames.com/meaning/0/Eliza|publisher=Think Baby Names|accessdate=12 January 2012}}</ref> <ref>{{cite web|title=Aliza|url=http://www.babynamespedia.com/meaning/Aliza|publisher=Babynamespedia|accessdate=12 January 2012}}</ref> Closely related variant names are [[Elisa]] and the French form [[Élise]]. ==People with this name== * [[Eliza Bennett]] (born 1992), English actress * [[Eliza Carthy]] (born 1975), folk singer * [[Eliza Chulkhurst]] (1100-34 ''or'' 1500-34), conjoined twin * [[Eliza Doolittle (singer)]] (born 1988), British singer * [[Eliza Dushku]] (born 1980), American actress * [[Eliza Fraser]], Scottish woman after whom Fraser Island in Australia is named * [[Eliza Orzeszkowa]], Polish writer nominated for the [[Nobel prize]] * [[Eliza Taylor-Cotter]] (born 1989), Australian actress * [[Eliza Valentine]] (born 1997), Australian PEZ enthusiast ===Fictional characters=== Characters in literary and screen works known solely as '''Eliza''' include: * [[Eliza (Uncle Tom's Cabin)|Eliza (''Uncle Tom's Cabin'')]], a slave from ''Uncle Tom's Cabin'' * [[Eliza (Stephenson character)]], a socialite from [[Neal Stephenson]]'s ''Baroque Cycle'' of novels * Eliza, the wife in the ''Eliza'' series of novels by [[Barry Pain]] * Eliza, a ghost child in short film ''[[Tormented (short film)|Tormented]]'' * Eliza, love interest of [[Faust VIII]] in the manga ''Shaman King'' Characters that have the first name Eliza and a known last name include: * [[Elizabeth Bennet|Elizabeth "Eliza" Bennet]] in the novel ''Pride and Prejudice'' * [[Eliza_Doolittle|Elizabeth "Eliza" Doolittle]] in the play ''[[Pygmalion (play)|Pygmalion]]'' and the musical inspired by it, ''[[My Fair Lady]]'' * Eliza Fletcher, a character in the ''[[Phineas and Ferb]]'' episode ''My Fair Goalie'' who was inspired by Eliza Doolittle. * [[Eliza Thornberry]] in ''The Wild Thornberrys'' ==See also== *[[Elisa (name)]] *[[Élise]] *[[Eliza (disambiguation)]] - other meanings ==References== {{Reflist}} {{given name|Eliza|cat=Feminine given names}}
